overview:
Rodrigo is the Co-founder and CTO at CreativeWorks (creativeworks.ag), an emerging digital creative with presence in Mexico, Brazil and the U.S.

He received his Master in Systems Engineering from the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro and brings more than 18 years of experience in marketing, business development and computer engineering, including deep experience with embedded/mobile applications.

He has a long track record of leading creative teams and developing innovative products in companies such as IBM, Vodafone, SIEMENS, Nokia, Inter-American Development Bank, among others.
